title: Autumn Angels
description: A Rock'n'Roll James Joyce?That's what some obscure British critic said about the writing of Arthur Byron Cover, whose stories about immortal, all-powerful god-like men and women hamstrung by the archetypes they impersonate would have been hailed by millions ... if they'd only read them.Initially edited by Harlan Ellison and published in a series of first novels, Autumn Angels was nominated for a Nebula Award and quickly established Cover as one of the most imaginative writers in the genre.Now, with an introduction by A.A. Attanasio
author: Arthur Byron Cover
